attributes.action: Reduce the abortion limit to 12 weeks unless there are any complications involving the unborns and/or the mothers health.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: An unborn child can survive at 20 weeks... the abortion limit is 24 weeks, where is the logic in that. I personally think and I'm sure others will agree with me that it is wrong to abort a fully developed baby.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
